concept.title: Data Preview Availability
concept.shortdesc: You can preview complete and incomplete pipelines. The Data Preview icon becomes active when data preview is available.

conbody.p:
data previewavailabilityYou can preview data under the following conditions:
All stages in the pipeline are connected
All required properties are defined

p.note: Stage configuration does not have to be accurate or complete to preview data. After you connect all stages, you can enable data preview by entering any valid value for required properties.
